name: NCTE Annual Convention (#NCTE24) | Nov 21-24, Boston, MA
content: Experience the foremost gathering for English language arts and literacy educators at the NCTE 2024 Annual Convention. This event offers a unique opportunity to participate in over 1,000 sessions led by industry experts, providing insights and inspiration to elevate your teaching. Network with educators from across the USA, enjoy diverse social and cultural events, and explore a wide array of publisher booths in the Exhibit Hall. Celebrate the achievements of your peers at the awards ceremony, and connect with a community of professionals who understand your challenges and share your dedication. Don't miss the chance to be part of this vibrant community at the NCTE Annual Convention in Boston, Massachusetts. As an added benefit, becoming an NCTE member makes you eligible for a USD $130 savings on early bird rates by registering before 16 October 2024, making this valuable experience even more accessible.
